name: serialize
short_description:
methods of the Serialize.cs class (de/)serialize a tree of C# data objects (instances of classes) to/from JSON-compatible text string (JSON adopted for strongly typed data) to be saved to file, sent over network etc.
Serializes all public fields of each data object, ignores all other members of data objects.
Limitations:
- cannot cope with circular/looped references
- multiple references to same instance of class are serialized as multiple instances of that class
- Can serialize only C# bool, int, float, string, Guid, generic List's of all supported types, data objects (instances of classes with default/zero-parameter constructors)
summary: serializer of C# tree of data objects to/from JSON
